text: Haha, feel like I am only coming here with random bugs, but I guess having a production website using CMS React is a result of that. I have the weird issue that blogs from one specific blog has an empty (null) `content` key. :sweat_smile: I am using the build in blog_recent_post function. On all other blog types I do get the `content` back but for this specific blog type all content is null.
